Glowsong

Coming Summer 2026 to Google Play

See the color. Feel the rhythm. Hear the solution.

Glowsong is a puzzle game about blending light.

Your goal is to recreate a specific target color by mixing Red, Green, and Blue circles. You can add, move, and resize the circles to adjust the mix until it matches perfectly.

The game uses audio and haptics to give you feedback as you play. Each primary color has a unique vibration pattern and sound tone. When you solve the puzzle, the game plays a short melody generated from the specific colors you used to complete the level.

Features:
  • Color Logic: A calm puzzle based on additive color blending
  • Haptics: Distinct vibration signatures for different colors
  • Audio: Unique tones for every color that combine into a tune upon victory
  • Clean Design: No ads, no accounts, and works entirely offline
